txt.en: A bounty notice asks you to seek out a goblin that has been seen lurking around the cavern of Scraper's Clough in the Floodfells.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
You remove the completed bounty from the Liml贸k bounty board, feeling a sense of accomplishment in your efforts to protect the Langflood.
Defeat all goblins in Scraper's Clough.

The bounty notice reads:

'Goblins run rampant in the Floodfells! By decree of Runerik Knotbeard, thane of Liml贸k, all goblins are to be found and defeated immediately! A particularly troublesome goblin has been recently spotted taking refuge in the cave of Scraper's Clough. A reward to any who can defeat it with haste!'

<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest has a one hour time limit. The timer will begin upon accepting the quest.</rgb>
You should return to Liml贸k and remove the completed bounty from the bounty board.
Examine the bounty and defeat goblins in Scraper's Clough
Return to Liml贸k and remove the completed bounty
